revised_title: Investigating the Variation of Wave-Length of Oscillations Generated by an Ionic Valve
tldr: The authors conducted experiments on the variation of wave-length of oscillations generated by an ionic valve due to changes in filament current. They found that there is a maximum wave-length for a specific filament current, and the wave-length and amplitude of oscillations decrease when the filament current is increased beyond this value. The authors also discovered a correlation between the resistance of the circuit and the wave-length and amplitude of oscillations.
